abstract: Robert Caro, author of The Power Broker, renowned biography of famed urban planner Robert Moses, takes Dutch Prime Min Mark Rutte on personal tour of bridges, parks and roadways constructed by New York City’s master builder.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Caro, the biographer, led Mark Rutte of the Netherlands through one of Robert Moses’ 12 offices and the many New York City features that the power broker built.

headline.main: The Dutch Prime Minister Is a Big Fan of Robert Caro
headline.print_headline: The Prime Minister Is a Big Fan

snippet: Mr. Caro, the biographer, led Mark Rutte of the Netherlands through one of Robert Moses’ 12 offices and the many New York City features that the power broker built.

keywords.value: The Power Broker: Robert Moses and the Fall of New York (Book)
